MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G77 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00pm to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network after a fault earlier today for properties on Mearns Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:48pm on Saturday, 16 January 2021
